attributes.action: Stop funding of political parties by the taxpayers of this country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Members of political parties get paid more than enough to fund their own parties.
Use their own wages to pay for expenses and running costs.
Discuss any wage increases with a taxpayers committee.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
